SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_UMHS_INTEREST_GETDEPTS
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: retrieves that MIMED interest departments subdepartments
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: UM Dev
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: CREATE FUNCTION DBO.USR_UFN_UMHS_INTEREST_GETDEPTS (@INTERESTID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN (SELECT ID, DEPARTMENTID, SUBDEPARTMENTID FROM DBO.USR_UMHS_INTERESTDEPTSUBDEPT WHERE INTERESTID = @INTERESTID)
